DOC.brief_summary: This study aim collect follow Serbia-specific epidemiology data hypercholesterolemia : patent characteristic , patient ' management/treatment physician ' standard practice . In addition , aim determine proportion patient lipid-lowering pharmacological treatment reach LDL-C HDL-C treatment goal .
DOC.brief_title: An Epidemiological Study Aimed Record Standard Daily Practice Managing Patients With Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: Patients hypercholesterolemia currently receive lipid lower agent Pregnancy lactation .
DOC.keyword: Standard daily practice manage patient hypercholesterolemia
